full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO GSANG SGRUB KYI GTOR CHOG DNGOS GRUB KYI RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,CES DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO GSANG SGRUB KYI GTOR CHOG DNGOS GRUB KYI RGYA MTSO CES BYA BA 'DI NI, GANGS CAN MKHAS PA'I 'BYUNG GNAS DPAL LDAN 'BRAS SPUNGS SPYI SO'I SDE BA GUNG RU RAB 'BYAMS PA BSTAN 'DZIN 'OD ZER GYIS RGYANG RING PO NAS LHA RDZAS GSER ZHO GSUM DANG BCAS DANG BCAS 'PHRIN YIG GI LAM NAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, RIGS PA 'DZIN PA'I THA SHAL BA ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS DAM PA GONG MA'I MAN NGAG BZHIN TU JI LTAR 'OS PA'I TSIG SBYOR RNAMS GSAR TU BGYIS TE MDO SMAD PHYOGS THAMS CAD LAS @014B RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I CHOS SDE CHEN PO DGON LUNG BYAMS PA GLING GI BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'OD 'BAR TU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI AOR TU SU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DON 'GRUB KYIS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,
